name: Scarabug
description:
Github Game Off 2021 jam entry. Theme "Bug".

GitHub page: https://github.com/Sansduke/scarabug

Use mouse or touch controls. Any 2 bugs of any type can be swapped with each other. Match up same colored scarabs in groups of 4 or more to score points. More points are awarded for larger matches and matches triggered in succession. More points are also awarded at higher levels.

This is solo project.
